issue.message:
The lint detector `timber.lint.WrongTimberUsageDetector` called `context.getMainProject()` during module analysis.
This does not work correctly when running in AGP (8.0.1).
In particular, there may be false positives or false negatives because the lint check may be using the minSdkVersion or manifest information from the library instead of any consuming app module.
Contact the vendor of the lint issue to get it fixed/updated (if known, listed below), and in the meantime you can try to work around this by disabling the following issues:
"LogNotTimber","StringFormatInTimber","ThrowableNotAtBeginning","BinaryOperationInTimber","TimberArgCount","TimberArgTypes","TimberTagLength","TimberExceptionLogging"
Issue Vendors: Identifier: jetified-timber-4.7.1
Call stack: Context.getMainProject(Context.kt:112)←WrongTimberUsageDetector.visitMethod(WrongTimberUsageDetector.java:80)←Detector.visitMethodCall(Detector.kt:546)←UElementVisitor$DelegatingPsiVisitor.visitMethodCallExpression(UElementVisitor.kt:1096)←UElementVisitor$DelegatingPsiVisitor.visitCallExpression(UElementVisitor.kt:1076)←UCallExpression$DefaultImpls.accept(UCallExpression.kt:85)←JavaUCallExpression.accept(javaUCallExpressions.kt:28)←UQualifiedReferenceExpression$DefaultImpls.accept(UQualifiedReferenceExpression.kt:34)←JavaUCompositeQualifiedExpression.accept(JavaUCompositeQualifiedExpression.kt:25)←UQualifiedReferenceExpression$DefaultImpls.accept(UQualifiedReferenceExpression.kt:33)←JavaUCompositeQualifiedExpression.accept(JavaUCompositeQualifiedExpression.kt:25)←ImplementationUtilsKt.acceptList(implementationUtils.kt:15)←UBlockExpression$DefaultImpls.accept(UBlockExpression.kt:21)←JavaUCodeBlockExpression.accept(JavaUCodeBlockExpression.kt:25)←UCatchClause$DefaultImpls.accept(UTryExpression.kt:122)←JavaUCatchClause.accept(JavaUTryExpression.kt:50)←ImplementationUtilsKt.acceptList(implementationUtils.kt:15)←UTryExpression$DefaultImpls.accept(UTryExpression.kt:71)←JavaUTryExpression.accept(JavaUTryExpression.kt:24)←ImplementationUtilsKt.acceptList(implementationUtils.kt:15)
When targeting Android 13 or higher, posting a permission requires holding the `POST_NOTIFICATIONS` permission (usage from com.bumptech.glide.request.target.NotificationTarget)
If you need access to FINE location, you must request both `ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION` and `ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION`
